title: How 'genius' Nadal won 22 Grand Slams - including Wimbledon epic
description: BBC Sport pays tribute to Rafael Nadal's incredible career and looks back at the 2008 Wimbledon final, after the 22-time Grand Slam winner announced he will be retiring at the end of the season.
excerpt: BBC Sport pays tribute to Rafael Nadal's incredible career and looks back at the 2008 Wimbledon final, after the 22-time Grand Slam winner announced he will be retiring at the end of the season.
text: BBC Sport pays tribute to Rafael Nadal's incredible career and looks back at the 2008 Wimbledon final, after the 22-time Grand Slam winner announced he will be retiring at the end of the season.READ MORE: Tennis legend Nadal to retire after Davis Cup FinalsAvailable to UK users only.
html:
BBC Sport pays tribute to Rafael Nadal's incredible career and looks back at the 2008 Wimbledon final, after the 22-time Grand Slam winner announced he will be retiring at the end of the season.

READ MORE: Tennis legend Nadal to retire after Davis Cup Finals

Available to UK users only.
